yaml.description: News features and peer-reviewed publications from the FEWsLab team.

markdown.markdown:
```{r setup} source("_common.R") ``` - Dr. Grady was quoted in a Law360 analysis of [What The Feds’ Colo. River Plan Could Mean For The West](https://www.law360.com/articles/1597564/what-the-feds-colo-river-plan-could-mean-for-the-west). - Dr. Grady was quoted in a [Marketplace report](https://www.marketplace.org/2022/08/18/how-drought-zaps-electricity-production-and-drives-up-prices/) on how drought could zap electricity production and raise prices. - Dr. Grady and PhD student Lauren Dennis co-authored an article on [climate change and hydropower for The Conversation](https://theconversation.com/hydropowers-future-is-clouded-by-droughts-floods-and-climate-change-its-also-essential-to-the-us-electric-grid-182314). - Dr. Grady and Lauren Dennis were [interviewed on WORT](https://www.wortfm.org/how-hydropower-impacts-the-electric-grid/) about how hydropower impacts the electric grid. - FEWsLab articles were featured in the Global Water Forum blogs on [climate adaptation](https://globalwaterforum.org/2022/06/08/for-the-future-of-food-energy-and-water-security-how-are-we-adapting-to-climate-change/) and [language use in water resources research](https://globalwaterforum.org/2022/05/25/watery-research-boundaries-why-the-language-we-use-to-describe-our-water-research-matters/). --- ### Featured Journal Articles - Grady, C. et al. *Hidden Gems: Highlighting Underrepresented but Valuable Knowledge in the Water-Energy-Food Nexus*. Journal of Hydrology, 2023. [https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jhydrol.2023.129597](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jhydrol.2023.129597) - Hinojos, S. et al. *Social and Environmental Vulnerability to Flooding*. Applied Geography, 2023. [https://doi.org/10.1016/j.apgeog.2023.103017](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.apgeog.2023.103017) - Grady, C. et al. *When Smart Systems Fail: The Ethics of Cyber-Physical Critical Infrastructure Risk*. IEEE Transactions on Technology and Society, 2021. [PDF](https://blogs.gwu.edu/caitlin-grady/files/2021/02/Grady_IEEETSS_2021.pdf) - Mahjabin, T. et al. *Virtual Nitrogen and Virtual Water Transfers in Food Trade Networks*. Environmental Research Letters, 2021. [https://doi.org/10.1088/1748-9326/abe06f](https://doi.org/10.1088/1748-9326/abe06f) - Calder, R. et al. *COVID-19 Reveals Vulnerabilities of the FEW Nexus to Pandemics*. Environmental Science & Technology Letters, 2021. [https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.estlett.1c00291](https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.estlett.1c00291) - Gomez, M. et al. *Fragility of a Multilayer Network of Intranational Supply Chains*. Applied Network Science, 2020. [https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s41109-020-00310-1](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s41109-020-00310-1) - Mohammadpour, P. et al. *Food, Energy, Water Security in Ecuador, Bolivia, and Peru*. Environmental Science & Policy, 2019. [https://doi.org/10.1016/j.envsci.2019.08.014](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.envsci.2019.08.014) - Mahjabin, T. et al. *Water Footprint Efficiency Across the US*. PLOS ONE, 2018. [https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0202301](https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0202301) - Grady, C. et al. *Social Network Analysis for International Development Project Selection*. Expert Systems with Applications, 2015. [http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0957417415001463?via%3Dihub](http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0957417415001463?via%3Dihub) --- ### Google Scholar Profiles - [Caitlin Grady](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=HoSryoQAAAAJ&hl=en) - [Michael Gomez](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=ClC7U1QAAAAJ&hl=en) - Selena Hinojos - Abbey Kollar - [Paniz Mohammadpour](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=8r0FciwAAAAJ&hl=en) - [Lauren Dennis](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=t9saXqQAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao) - [Sarah Torhan](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=9aVOsfIAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao) - [Tasnuva Mahjabin](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=9TcDoEIAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao) - [Luis Delgado](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Ho-7wskAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=sra) --- ### Peer-Reviewed Books & Chapters - Younos, T. and C. Grady, eds. 2014. *Potable Water: Emerging Global Problems and Solutions*. Springer. [Link](http://www.springer.com/us/book/9783319065625) - Grady, C. et al. 2014. *Global Potable Water: Current Status, Critical Problems and Future Perspectives*. In: *Potable Water*. Springer. - Younos, T. and C. Grady, eds. 2013. *Climate Change in Water Resources*. Springer. [Link](http://www.springer.com/la/book/9783642375859) ---

Dr. Grady at AGU 2017
